languages.text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
languages.original_text:
Всякий раз, когда демон вступает в бой, каждый член отряда теряет −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} демона)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.
Всякий раз, когда демон умирает, каждый член отряда получает 30 моментума.
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} демона все существа на соседних клетках проходят проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект "ужасы" варпа.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's WP bonus)</u> momentum. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's turns, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower resistance test or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.

Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.

Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.

Всякий раз, когда демон вступает в бой, каждый член отряда теряет −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} демона)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. Всякий раз, когда демон умирает, каждый член отряда получает 30 моментума.
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} демона все существа на соседних клетках проходят проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасы варпа{/g}.

Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.

traits.locale_text:
Всякий раз, когда демон вступает в бой, каждый член отряда теряет −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} демона)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. Всякий раз, когда демон умирает, каждый член отряда получает 30 моментума.
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} демона все существа на соседних клетках проходят проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасы варпа{/g}.

languages.text:
Greift der Dämon in den Kampf ein, erleidet jedes Gruppenmitglied −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Dämons)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}. Stirbt der Dämon, erhält jedes Gruppenmitglied +30 Dynamik.
Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Dämons müssen alle Kreaturen um ihn herum eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Willenskraft bestehen, um nicht mit dem Effekt {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}"Schrecken des Warp"{/g} belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Wann immer der Dämon in den Kampf eingreift, erleidet jedes Gruppenmitglied −<u>(1× Dämon-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}. Wann immer der Dämon stirbt, erlangt jedes Gruppenmitglied +30 Dynamik.
Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Dämons müssen alle Kreaturen um ihn herum eine Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, sonst erleiden sie den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Schrecken des Warp.

languages.text:
Lorsque le démon entre dans le combat, tous les membres du groupe subissent −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} du démon)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. Lorsque le démon meurt, ils récupèrent tous +30 de fougue.
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du démon, toutes les créatures qui l'entourent doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horreurs du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque le démon entre dans le combat, tous les membres du groupe subissent −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} du démon)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. Lorsque le démon meurt, ils récupèrent tous +30 de fougue.
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du démon, toutes les créatures qui l'entourent doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} de Force mentale, faute de quoi elles subissent l'effet Horreurs du Warp.

languages.text:
每当恶魔出现在战斗中时，队伍中的每位成员{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}都会降低<u>（1×恶魔的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。当恶魔死亡时，队伍中的每位成员士气都会提高30点。
当恶魔的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，它周围的所有生物都需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会遭受{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}“亚空间的恐怖”{/g}效果影响。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
每当恶魔出现在战斗中时，队伍中的每位成员{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}都会降低<u>（1×恶魔的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。当恶魔死亡时，队伍中的每位成员士气都会提高30点。
当恶魔的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，它周围的所有生物都需要进行意志抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会遭受“亚空间的恐怖”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响。

每当恶魔出现在战斗中时，队伍中的每位成员{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}都会降低<u>（1×恶魔的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。当恶魔死亡时，队伍中的每位成员士气都会提高30点。
当恶魔的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，它周围的所有生物都需要进行意志抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会遭受“亚空间的恐怖”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。

languages.text:
Cuando el daemon entra en combate, cada miembro del grupo pierde −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del daemon)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. Cuando el daemon muere, cada miembro del grupo gana +30 de ímpetu.
Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del daemon, todas las criaturas que lo rodean deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad o sufrir el efecto de {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrores de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando el daemon entra en combate, cada miembro del grupo pierde −<u>(1 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del daemon)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}. Cuando el daemon muere, cada miembro del grupo gana +30 de ímpetu.
Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del daemon, todas las criaturas que lo rodean deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de Voluntad o sufrir el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de horrores de la disformidad.

languages.text:
ディーモンが戦闘に入ると、パーティメンバー全員の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に −<u>(1 × ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>の影響が出る。ディーモンが死ぬときは必ず、パーティメンバー全員が推進力 +30を獲得する。
ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まるたびに、周囲のすべての生物はWP{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、<歪み>のホラー効果に苦しまなければならない。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.

traits.locale_text:
ディーモンが戦闘に入ると、パーティメンバー全員の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}に −<u>(1 × ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>の影響が出る。ディーモンが死ぬときは必ず、パーティメンバー全員が推進力 +30を獲得する。
ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まるたびに、周囲のすべての生物は意志力抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければ、<歪み>のホラー{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}に苦しまなければならない。

ディーモンが戦闘に入ると、パーティメンバー全員の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に −<u>(1 × ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>の影響が出る。ディーモンが死ぬときは必ず、パーティメンバー全員が推進力 +30を獲得する。
ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まるたびに、周囲のすべての生物は意志力抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければ、<歪み>のホラー{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}に苦しまなければならない。

languages.text:
Bu iblis çatışmaya girdiğinde her bir grup üyesi, −<u>(1 × iblisin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İRA{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentuma{/g} maruz kalır. İblis öldüğünde her bir grup üyesi +30 momentum kazanır.
İblis her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} başladığında çevresindeki tüm yaratıklar, İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}öteboyut dehşetleri{/g} etkisine maruz kalırlar.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the daemon enters combat, each party member suffers −<u>(1 × daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Whenever the daemon dies, each party member gains +30 momentum.
At the start of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
